## What is OpenSpec?

OpenSpec 定義了 AI skill module 的標準結構：

```
skill-{name}/
├── module.yaml       # Contract: inputs, outputs, pipeline
├── skills/           # AI agent behavior specs
├── reference/        # Domain knowledge base
├── tools/            # Executable scripts
├── examples/         # Working demonstrations
└── README.md
```

任何支持 tool-use 的 AI 框架（LangChain, CrewAI, Claude, OpenAI Assistants）都能整合 OpenSpec 模組。

[OpenSpec Standard →](https://github.com/ai-cooperation/openspec)

## Build Your Own Skill

1. Clone the [OpenSpec template](https://github.com/ai-cooperation/openspec/tree/main/examples/minimal-skill)
2. Define your `module.yaml`
3. Write your skills and reference docs
4. Add examples
5. Validate with `python3 validate.py your-skill/`
